subject: Re: Etch on a Thinkpad T23
body:
On Friday 04 May 2007 20:50, Jonathan Yavner jyavner-at-member.fsf.org |debian_laptop| wrote:
> OMG, what a hassle!  But I've got it working now.  Here are my notes 
> (including some nekkid T23 pictures!)
>     http://home.comcast.net/~jyavner/T23/

Suggestion: add that website to the list on http://www.linux-laptop.net/ and http://tuxmobil.org

Most people will no doubt look on those sites before searching this mailing list.


--

with a subject of "unsubscribe". Trouble? Contact listmaster@lists.debian.org
